title.rendered: Piklist is a proud sponsor of WordCamp NYC

content.rendered:
On June 9, 2012, Kevin and I publicly released the first version of Piklist at WordCamp NYC. We had worked hard on it for almost a year and were frankly nervous when it came time to present. But the reaction was really positive, and our Saturday session turned into an additional workshop on Sunday.

WordCamp NYC holds a special place for Kevin and me, and we are proud to be sponsoring the event this year.

Sessions are still being finalized for this August’s event, but one thing is for sure: we’ll be attending! If you will also be at WordCamp NYC, please let us know via Twitter or our contact form— we would love to meet you.
